author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Pudukottai municipality has obtained ‘ISO 9001:2008’ certification in recognition of its service to the people and for setting up adequate state-of-the-art infrastructure for municipal administration.

A team of analysts from TVE Certification Services Private Limited visited the town and took up a comprehensive assessment with regard to various services provided by the municipality. The focus was on administration of the municipal office, impact of the services on consumers, the quality of services being rendered by the municipal employees and officials.

“The new building constructed for the municipal office has been a major factor which qualified the municipality to get the award,” said R. Rajasekar, Municipal Chairman, who was present at a function held here recently to mark the issue of the certificate.

Executives of the TVE Certification Services Private Limited explained the procedure adopted for the assessment of the municipality for the certificate.
title: Pudukottai municipality gets ISO tag
